Song.title: Always Forgiven
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Jonathan and Ryan Baird © 2003 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Emaj7 A2/E Emaj7 A2/E B/E A/E :||]
Verse 1: [Emaj7]I don’t [A2/E]deserve [Bsus]to be [E]Your servant [Emaj7]And how [A2/E]much less [Bsus]to be [E]Your child [Emaj7]Anger [A2/E]and wrath, [Bsus]sure con[E]demnation [Emaj7]Should be [A2/E]my portion, [Bsus]my just [E]reward [Emaj7]Never [A2/E]have seen it, [Bsus]never [E]will know it [Emaj7]Your lov[A2/E]ing kindness [Bsus]enfolds [E]my life [E2]
Chorus: [E]All You have [A2]shown me is [Bsus]Grace, love and [E]mer[E/D#]cy [C#m7]Now and for[A2]ever, [Bsus]I am Your [E]child [E]Freely You [A2]pour out [Bsus]Your loving [E]kind[E/D#]ness [C#m7]Father of [A2]Grace, You [Bsus]welcome me [Emaj7 (to turn)]in
Turn: [Emaj7 A2/E Emaj7 A2/E B/E A/E]
Verse 2: [Emaj7]All of [A2/E]the sin [Bsus]I have [E]committed [Emaj7]Was placed [A2/E]upon [Bsus]Your right[E]eous Son [Emaj7]And now [A2/E]You see me{,} [Bsus]through His [E]perfection [Emaj7]As if [A2/E]I’d never [Bsus]done an[E]y wrong [Emaj7]Always [A2/E]forgiven, [Bsus]always [E]accepted [Emaj7]No fear [A2/E]of judgment [Bsus]before [E]Your throne [E2 (to chorus)]
Ending: [C#m7]Father of [A2]Grace, You [Bsus]welcome me [C#m7]in [C#m7]Father of [A2]Grace, You [Bsus]welcome me [E]in
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i dont deserve to be your servant and how much less to be your child anger and wrath sure condemnation should be my portion my just reward never have seen it never will know it your loving kindness enfolds my life chorus all you have shown me is grace love and mercy now and forever i am your child freely you pour out your loving kindness father of grace you welcome me in turn verse 2 all of the sin i have committed was placed upon your righteous son and now you see me through his perfection as if id never done any wrong always forgiven always accepted no fear of judgment before your throne ending father of grace you welcome me in father of grace you welcome me in
